title: Launch button doesn't work! patch 6.24-7.1
body: Basically as the title states since patch 6.24 I have not been able to log into league I'll click launch the button turns grey then boom back to the same orange launch button does nothing, I've tried reinstalling, I've tried deleting those two folder's inside the riot games section thing ( who ever has this problem knows what I'm talking) and it doesn't work please did someone have this problem and found a fix?

replies.body:
This issue usually means that your computer has an *unstable connection* to our login servers. This is typically caused by certain network settings that prevent you from reaching those servers, so I recommend going through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are fine.

If this fixed your issue, let me know!
